Articles.Content:
Hello, I play on xbox series X, and I recently made my first space station, and decided to go for a celebratory EVA. Long story short, I accidentally destroyed my solar panels. I was going to send repair kits up to repair it, but they're not in the build menu. I tried reloading, and restarting. I looked it up and it saaid 1.11 (EVA repair update) was on xbox. Just looking for answers. Thanks! 

Edited March 30, 2023 by Kerbal Space Noob
Spelling mistakes.
